title.en-US: Natural coconut bowl and spoon set

content.value: Eco friendlyÂ 100% natural coconut shell and wooden spoon set. Perfect Buddha bowl, Acai bowl, smoothie bowl, rice bowl.
Coconut shells are a by-product of coconut oil production - they are usually discarded or burnt. Our bowls are made from real coconuts that have been reclaimed.
Each bowl is unique so shape, size and form may vary - just like all of us ðŸ˜€

The bowl and spoon set is a beautiful addition to any kitchen or travel bag for on-the-go. Kickstart or continue your healthy lifestyle, or give to someone as a gift - great for anyone, and vegans especially love these.
x2 different sized silicone bases for the bowl

cotton mesh bag for storage and washing

This eco friendly soap dish is madeÂ fromÂ
Â - a material that makes each soap holder unique and beautiful.

The wooden dish is very water-resistant, which means it won't easily deteriorate. It's also very sturdy and pressure resistant so it won't change in shape with time. You can rest assured that your dish won't break or deform easily. As the wood is natural, you can expect some slight colour variations.Â
It's important to let your soap dry out in-between uses and this dish does the trick! It has water draining holes which allow the soap to breathe and prevent it fromÂ getting slimy.

blogTitle.en-US: 10 great sustainable gifts for any budget

content.value: Want to giveÂ someone a token of your appreciation without feeling like youâ€™re contributing to unnecessary waste? Tired of buying gifts that ultimately end up in a dark cupboard somewhere or get trashed? Whether itâ€™s for your best friend, your lover, your colleague, grandmother or neighbour - we got you. Yes - sustainable giftsÂ

EvenÂ if youâ€™re working towards a reduced waste / zero waste lifestyle yourself, itâ€™s easy to get overwhelmed and be tempted to throw your ethics out of the window when buying for someone else. The pressures surrounding some holidays can be a source of anxiety (weâ€™re looking at you, Christmasâ€¦) but weâ€™re here to make choosing a meaningful, sustainable and affordable gift that little bit easier.

Often the easiest and most cost-effective of all: your time! What better way to show someone you care about them than to spend time with them? We know this can feel impossible for a lot of people with everything thatâ€™s going on in the world right now, but spending time virtually can also make you feel connected.Â 
Why not set aside an hour or two for some video call fun and games with someone you miss? Choose a dress-up theme, grab a beverage and kick back! In-person interaction is usually best but your mental health will also greatly benefit from virtual connections.

MakingÂ collages can be SO much fun AND really meaningful - no two collages will ever be the same. Whatâ€™s more, if your current situations allow, itâ€™s something you can easily do together. Make use of photos, magazines and newspapers you already have lying around - no need to buy anything special.
IfÂ youâ€™re in Berlin, make sure you check out our friendsÂ

Â - they host regular collage art workshops in a relaxed and fun environment. Not in Berlin? Check them out for inspiration anyway! This is one of our favourites, created during their â€˜Nature and Escapesâ€™ themed workshop:
EasilyÂ our favourite alternative to plastic to date. The perfect sustainable gift for women, men and anyone in-between.

TreatÂ someone at the same time as treating the planet. The safety razor is really long-lasting and the blades easy to replace (simply twist the bottom to open) - not to mention really cheap compared to disposable alternatives. Help someone reduce their waste and save money in the long run.Â Their skin will feel aaaaamazing for it too.

Included in the kit: safety razor, replacement razor blades, vegan shaving brush, shaving soap (handmade and can be used on the entire body), an eco soap dish and a natural linen pouch.Â The kit comes in a box made from domestic grass and waste paper which can be composted.Â Â
Grab an eco friendly shaving kit for only â‚¬ 35 here

NotÂ sure they need the whole kit? Thatâ€™s cool too - why not start them off with just the razor? The One Planet razor comes with a natural linen pouch that is perfect for storage and travelling, as well as a pack of razor blades to get going straight away.Â
Grab a safety razor for less than â‚¬ 20 here
AÂ beautiful addition to any home or office. Really easy to hang and the geometric design allows airflow from all sides.Â
We love these stainless steel ones from Mkouo - they are durable and have no sharp edges. Top tip: clean them with a bit of lemon juice before the first use.Â
Plants are known to enhance mental and emotional health - especially important during these often disconnected times.Â
Grab two geometric plant holders for less than â‚¬ 17 here

WashableÂ makeup remover pads are the perfect alternative to disposable cotton pads. It pains us to admit that we used 2-3 disposable cotton pads per day before switching...which equates to a terrifying 1,000+ pads thrown away per year ðŸ˜± .Â  And thatâ€™s for one person.

ByÂ making it possible for someone to switch to these reusable facial cleanser pads you will be saving them money AND reducing their waste. They are easy to wash (cotton mesh bag for storage and washing included) and can be used over and over. They can also be repurposed as nursing pads. Always shipped in 100% plastic-free packaging.
Grab 16 bamboo cotton pads for â‚¬ 12 here

AÂ glass jar powered by solar energyâ€¦.say whaaaaaat? The glass stores energy during the day using a solar panel and releases light at night - producing a stunning result ðŸ˜ . A great way to repurpose glass jars you have lying around at home.
Â for making it yourself if youâ€™re up for it. You can personalise it for that special someone if youâ€™re feeling creative.Â

Don'tÂ have the time to make it yourself? SONNENGLAS have you covered. SONNENGLAS was developed in South Africa for people in areas without electricity. Their jars are all handmade and their production has provided much-needed jobs for women and men in Alexandra and Soweto.
Find out more about SONNENGLAS here
We're not affiliated in any way, just fans

LookingÂ for a gift for someone whose yoga mat has come to the end of its life? Or are you hoping to make it more comfortable for someone to do strength training, Pilates, stretching or meditation? Whatever the reason or occasion, a mat made from sustainable and ecological materials can be the ideal gift.Â
We love this non slip yoga mat. TheÂ cork surface absorbs excess moisture when sweating and the mat is extra thick to provide comfort.
Get a cork yoga mat for less than â‚¬ 30 here
Much easier to make than you might think! Give the gift of relaxation ðŸ’†
Image by Mathilde Langevin via Unsplash.com
Here is a simple recipe that you can make together or make it yourself and gift it in a repurposed glass jar or old box.
2 tbsp coconut or almond oil (or any oil of your choice, we just really like these two)
Mix the oil and water separately
Drizzle the oil and water mixture into the dry ingredients whilst stirring
Shape into balls with your hands
The bath balls will fizz for a few minutes when dropped in the bath.
HowÂ cute is this?! A handmade wooden helicopter puzzle to inspire creativity in children and improve hand-eye coordination.

Choose from a wide variety of animals and vehicles, all are made from light wood and are safe for children. Recommended from 3 years old and above, definitely one parents would enjoy getting involved in too.

This notebook is made from 75% elephant dung and 25% recycled paper! Made by a Sri Lankan charity that cares for elephants and resolves conflict within local communities, it would make an ideal gift for an animal lover, writing lover or just about anyone that appreciates beautiful ethical stationery. The paper is acid free and ecologically safe.

We'reÂ big on mental wellbeing and firmly believe in the importance of looking after oneâ€™s mind. What better way to show someone you care about them than inspiring them to take a time-out for themselves on a regular basis? Headspace can help with sleeping problems, stress, anxiety, mindfulness...you name it.

NotÂ sure whether you can nudge them into committing? No problem - simply suggest they try the basic version for free. If they like it, upgrade them to a plan with more features and content (less than â‚¬60 per year if paying annually). It will be worth it.
The eagle-eyed amongst you will no-doubt have noticed that there are actually 11 great gift ideas, not 10. Just call that a little gift from usÂ and don't say we've neverÂ given you anything... ðŸ˜‰

Seriously though, whatever you decide to make or buy for someone, try not to stress yourself out over it. The main thing is that you put thought into it and gave it from the heart - everything else will take care of itself.Â
Let us know in the comments below how you get on or if you have any other eco friendly gift ideas!Â
Sending you positive vibes from Berlin and Pula,

review.en-US: Not only were our products delivered in a timely manner, but the customer agents were extremely helpful and knowledgeable about all the products. They were able to help me make the best decision for my needs!

content.value: Beautiful eco friendly comb made from bamboo, suitable for all hair types.
The perfect alternative to plastic combs. This anti-static comb is gentle on your hair and scalp - great for taming flyaway hair!

This comb is ideal for daily use at home to detangle your hair, or can just as easily be carried around on-the-go as it's really lightweight and sturdy at the same time. It also works well for creating partings and combing beards.

Dimensions: 14cm x 3cm

(this product is handmade so there may be up to 1cm/0.4in difference)
This pack of 100 bamboo cotton buds is theÂ eco friendly alternative to plastic cotton buds - this one's a no-brainer.
Eco friendly bamboo cutlery set - the sustainable way to enjoy food and drink on the go.
This reusable utensil kit is perfect for picnics, camping, festivals, barbecues and is small and light enough to carry around in your pocket!
x 1 khaki green canvas travel pouch
The utensils are roughly 20cm long each.
ThisÂ bamboo charcoal toothbrush is another easy swap: eco friendly and as affordable as the plastic alternative.

Conventional toothbrushes are often made from different types of plastics which makes them impossible to recycle. By making this simple swap to a bamboo toothbrush you will be making the world of difference to plastic pollution.Â
x1 single adult toothbrush (choice of three colours)

review.en-US:
These products deliver what they promise!
The quality is noticeable and the designs are fantastic. I can't believe I didn't know about these products sooner!
I've started buying gifts from One Planet for all my family and friends because I can't get enough!

The products look even better in person than in the website pictures! I am so in love with my wooden spoon that I can't imagine ever having gone without it.
The ordering process was quick and easy, and my products were delivered quickly. If you're on the fence about whether to buy from here or not, do yourself a favor and just order â€“ you won't regret it!

This shaving kit is unisex! As a woman, you may not have thought of using a brush but trust us - your legs will thank you for it!
